JobFullDesc:
Energy Impact Partners (EIP) operates the world’s largest venture capital fund focused on the energy convergence with over $1.5 billion in assets under management. EIP pioneered a successful collaborative model that utilizes strategic investors across the globe, with investments across energy, mobility, cybersecurity, artificial intelligence, and smart buildings.

For its next fund, EIP is seeking a Vice President to lead its efforts in Europe. This position will report to the Managing Partner for Europe.

Key areas of responsibility:


Leading EIP’s investment activities in a given region/sector
Sourcing and vetting new investments across EIP’s core investment areas
Leading due diligence on all new investment opportunities
Drafting investment memorandum for Investment Committee approval
Pursuing business development with private equity funds and investment banks
Working closely with EIP’s VP for Commercialization & Innovation to accelerate business between our LP’s and portfolio companies
Shaping EIP’s strategy towards energy, and energy-adjacent, investment sectors
Participating in portfolio companies as a Board member and managing a growing portfolio of investments

The ideal candidate will have:


5+ years of investment experience in venture or growth capital
A compelling investment track record
Sector expertise in one of our target areas: SaaS/Software, mobility, cybersecurity, artificial intelligence, smart buildings & cities
High IQ, EQ and ethical standards
A commitment to our values:
	
We aspire to create a better future by driving a sustainable energy transformation
We believe in showing respect for all individuals both within and outside of our organization
We seek to create an environment where the best ideas win
We put the interests of our partners and portfolio companies ahead of all else
We prioritize the team ahead of our egos and are committed to the success of the firm and each other
